title: League Store App
body:
Well, sometimes during releases of all kind of skins taling bout limited, legacy or whatever, some players tend to be able to access their league client tho they may not be in the correct place to, so what I consider to be a good idea is for RIOT to create a League Store Aapp which could be available on mobile phones, so that on the way and having their account connected to the app, players could buy rp on the way and even bould uy skins directly from their mobile and hoping it would show up on their client next time they log in via their pc, laptop or whatever :)
Dunno if anyone would agree with me, but I find this a really good idea ^^ tho that I often hear players saying " Omg I was on holidays and I left my laptop at home :("(that's an example) 
So, hope RIOT notice my idea :) Thanks for reading

replies.body: i like it. they could make you purchase skin codes rather than the skins themselves so the computer platform and the mobile platform don't have a clash and lose the skin
It's a good idea, and would be way better then the 3rd party apps we have now (LoLchat)
actually a really good idea, riot could make it happen quite easy, much easier than creating a website store

Thank you :D
Please if you could share it, would be awesome :)
